According to TyC Sports reporter Gaston Edul, the World Cup winner will leave Villa Park in the summer and Tottenham want to bring him back to north London.

Football Insider claim that he wants to leave Elland Road in the summer and Tottenham, Chelsea and Manchester United have all shown an interest in the shot-stopper.
Gavin Bazunu
Despite being part of a Southampton side that have finished bottom of the Premier League, Bazunu has seemingly done enough to impress Tottenham.
A report from Football Insider claims that the Republic of Ireland international is rising up their shortlist of potential Lloris replacements and a bid in the region of Â£15m could be enough to seal his signature.

Oblak is viewed as one of the best goalkeepers in the world, having kept an incredible 191 clean sheets in 392 matches for Atletico Madrid.
